website_summaries.verdict: 500 grams of extra fine micronized creatine powder at a great price.
pros: The extra fine 99.9% pure creatine powder mixes into water or juice well and has no flavor
Many customers were pleased by their results
cons: Some customers reported  the powder not mixing well

customer_reviews.title: Great creatine for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this creatine several times over for a few reasons. It’s a reasonable price, it disappears into liquid well and it’s the form my trainers recommend. It comes with a mini scoop too!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Iliketotalkblog

customer_reviews.title: No flavor is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am using this right now to get ready for my return to the gym after a long injury. I wanted to not only load but halt the loss of muscle mass until I could go back to the weights again. I love that it is unflavored and mixes well with my other RSP supplements. I cannot attribute any gains as of yet because I am not lifting- I am just trying to keep what I still have. I will come back later to update after starting the weight training.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: The best !!
customer_reviews.text: I got this literally in one day! Amazing and I know this stuff works because I had to use a different brand due to not stocking up in time and I finished it and I don’t feel like I do with this brand! Works well and I trust it! No bad taste and a powdery substance not staticky like others
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm A 57 year old male that Weight trains every other day, I needed something that was easy to measure and mix. I also wanted a creatine product that wasn't pre-mixed with a pre-workout powder... this is, in my opinion, a high quality product and at a great price! At my age I need all the advantages I can get and this product fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great creatine mixes extremely well with anything!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well i was in look for a creatine and i was recomended the bcaa by RSP so i needed the creatine. Wasn't to sure on what creatine to get and wince im already drinking the RSP bcaa i went woth the creatine as well. And let me tell u i have no sude effects, no stomach bloating no explosive diarrhea it's is easy to drink and disolve best of all you'll see a difference in weeks. Just keep your water intake rolling. Great job RSP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chanis

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been on Creatine for years so I wasn't sure if I would like being on it or how it would make me feel. I have noticed great results without getting pump or cramps, like I used to. I will continue to use this product and reorder it when I run out. It resolves nicely in my protein drinks and with just water.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Mar

customer_reviews.title: Completely Unflavored and Great Results
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product was an easy 10/10. First, the fact it is unflavored was perfect as I could simply combine it with a shake or my pre and not taste any difference at all. Second, the reputation of RSP is first class as they make great products that you know are safe and clean. Lastly, as a completely unbiased customer the most important thing to me was results. Using the RSP creatine made recovery noticeably better than it was before, and it always left my muscles feeling full and fresh. I would highly recommend to anyone considering creatine, you can’t beat RSP.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gaynier

customer_reviews.title: Blends well and high quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over 2 years and it is still my go to creatine supplement! It's gives me the boost I need pre work out and helps with recovery and muscle growth post work out. No jitters or crash, just clean, well blended ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used countless creatine brands, and this is by far my favorite. Mixes well and doesn't clump together. Does what it's supposed to. I used to buy this on Bodybuilding.com since it was cheaper through them than the RSP website. Since I have to pay for shipping on BB, I find it buying through amazon is cheaper and arrives quicker, especially since I don't have to buy $100+ worth of supps to make the shipping expense worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HiMexBoi

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: No taste when u mix it with anything that’s very good but honestly it’s not working.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Beden

customer_reviews.title: Zero taste, dissolves well.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems very clean, it dissolves well, and has no noticeable taste. I do seem to have more energy at the gym and have noticed some increase in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyangel

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I love this Creatine from RSP. After a month of using it I started to notice a small leap forward in my workouts. I was not as sore after my workout and felt great during. I dump the powder straight into my mouth and chug it down with some water or OJ so I cannot say how well it mixes but im sure like their other products it mixes well enough. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Penturff

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I both use this 5-6 times a week before and after our lifts. Not sure if it makes you lift more weight but I can definitely tell my muscles heal faster and stronger than they do without it. We use this in addition to our whey protein which I like because it doesn't have any flavor and mixes easily so we can just throw the two in together. We're in the middle of our second 500g container and plan on getting a third whenever this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Effective product and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This creatine has been absolutely perfect for my workout needs, and is the best overall value for the price! It blends very well with every protein powder I've used, and has been great for my muscle recovery after longer lifting sessions. In terms of price per serving, it's a tremendous value as well - definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and saw noticeable difference after using product for a couple weeks. Improvement in strength and gains
customer_reviews.author: Dsilva

customer_reviews.title: It's tasteless
customer_reviews.text: There's no taste at all, it doesnt completely dissolve, but again there's no taste. Works good with Prime T , and N.O. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rjpperez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Mix
customer_reviews.text: Good value, Clean product. I like to mix it with RSP Amino Lean Fruit Punch, Lemon Lime, Or Pink Lemon Aid.
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: Is real
customer_reviews.text: The product I got was the real thing. It does not ruin any shakes because you can't even taste it even if you drink it with water. The only problem is my biceps are to damn big now.
customer_reviews.author: Franty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this product. Great price and great reviews sold me on it. And then when I started using it, I noticed a change right away. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great effects and dissolves smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a new workout regimen I was starting. The reviews caught my eye and after a week I am already seeing a rounding out of my muscles. It also dissolves very well in either regular water or with another product. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Butler

customer_reviews.title: Energy level
customer_reviews.text: Use it for shakes, give me the energy I need . Very good for the price
customer_reviews.author: ANA AVALOS

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to compare it to
customer_reviews.text: I've never used creatine so I have nothing to compare it to but I like it so far. I had some digestive discomfort at first but I cut the dose in half and I'm fine.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product mixes well and that it is unflavored so you can mix it into any other product you want. It is a good amount of creatine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Results and it mixes well!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and mixes well with just about anything. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Brand!
customer_reviews.text: The Company deserves no less than 5 stars! Anything from them is excellent regardless of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Florian Capitulo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, price, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely works. I can see the change in strength and resistance after a month using it. I do recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very smooth, not gritty like other creatines. Also digests very well. Helps with strength too, while taking this product I gained 25 pounds to my bench press in about a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect creatine for me
customer_reviews.text: The creatine has been great for me — it has no flavor and mixes well with my shakes. It’s a great size for me and should last a while — there are 100 servings in the 500 gram container. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: rsp provides quality products at great prices and great customer service
customer_reviews.author: jerry swain

customer_reviews.title: Good Creatine product
customer_reviews.text: Received it very quickly It does taste a little chalky so if you don't mind that , over all a good product . I will see how good it is as far as long term goes.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth it. This is my new favorite creatine.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Clark

customer_reviews.title: Creatine King
customer_reviews.text: First time supplementing creatine. RSP seems to offer a high quality product at a good price point. No side effects so far (1 month of use) and it has performed well for my workouts
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Creatine Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent creatine product. Easy to dissolve and drink. With excellent results in strength and endurance.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Gehret

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like how well it mixes, doesn’t leave clumps. For the price this is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recalled
customer_reviews.text: Was good until I got a recall email and had to throw it away...
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Clark

customer_reviews.title: Got the package but the seal under the cap (when ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the package but the seal under the cap (when you twist the cap off) was half way open
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves great, taste like nothing. If you know the taste of water it take just slightly more bitter than if u drank water w out & in my book that’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Percy

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: This is for my 17 yr old son, I trust RSP and their products for safe supplement support.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Value!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helped me during my training. Very effective product with great mixability. No gritty powder at the bottom of your shaker!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable gains
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly clean, pure form of Creatine. Very impressed with how well it mixes, no residue. The gains are noticeable. Great value
customer_reviews.author: William Munny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mixes perfectly with my preworkout and i'm seeing really nice gains from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Baker II

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from RSP
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from RSP. I add a teaspoon of this creatine to my protein shakes and it's been working great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot complain.
customer_reviews.text: Unflavored, easy to get down. Does what creatine needs to do. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Anker

customer_reviews.title: Solid Creatine
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely solid creatine. It has helped me build muscle and get stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product so far does what its supposed to do good price and good customer service!! :) Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Started seeing better pumps and strength improvements ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Started seeing better pumps and strength improvements very quickly. And being unflavored, it mixes perfectly with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like his creatine. Great strength boost and no bloating
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I use it with my pre and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it with my pre and post workout drinks. Mixes easily. Another great product from RSP Nutrition
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ierardi

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Overall really good product. 100 servings of creatine for around $20. Can't beat that. I didn't give it five stars because I still get the bloated feeling from it. I try not to take it everyday only on the days that I have big lifts like bench press, shoulder press, or squats. As far as gains and bigger size, it's too soon to tell. I've only been taking it two weeks. Maybe in a month. I'm happy with RSP products, they're my "go to" for BCAA's and creatine. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Griego

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a number of different creatines over the years and this is the best one yet!
customer_reviews.author: Trent jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best line of supplements out there!
customer_reviews.text: I only use RSP nutrition products - simple, pure, get what you need and nothing more. Approved by my neurologist and rheumatologist. And also my TeamRSP coach ;) LOVE THESE PRODUCTS!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Jo

customer_reviews.title: Seems inner seal was missing/stuck in the lid. Was ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems inner seal was missing/stuck in the lid. Was still sealed with outer tamper plastic. But leaked powder all in the deliver box and when the product was opened I lost around two serving due to the faulty inner seal.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Shady

customer_reviews.title: harmless, tasteless, targets muscle building
customer_reviews.text: My husband is recovering from a major illness & this product was recommended to help in rebuilding muscle. Approved by his doctor. Hasn't been using long enough to give a true evaluation but he is doing well, and hopefully this product is a contributing factor. He plans to continue using it as he recuperates.
customer_reviews.author: oxrdguru

customer_reviews.title: Creatine Monohydrate
customer_reviews.text: I switched to RSP creatine because I saw them rated highly on bodybuilding.com. I was previously using optimim nutritions creatine. I have no complaints and am still making progress towards my goals. It is flavorless so not much to say about taste. They do provide a little scoop which is nice because other brands have not. I don’t normally write reviews but was offered a free product. I’ve been using a lot of RSP products for my “cut” this summer so definitely a win.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Creatine is essential for muscle volumization and RSP Creatine Monohydrate is easily mixed with water or juice. The price is very competitive and easily ordered through Amazon. RSP has put together a number of great products and this is just one more.
customer_reviews.author: Brian James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, dissolves very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This product shipped and arrived very quickly. RSP Creatine monohydrate dissolves in water almost instantly. I also mixed in with coffee for a preworkout or mixed in cold water post workout. There isn't any after taste so its perfect alone or mixed in a drink or shake. I highly recommend this product. A great price and a great quality creatine.
customer_reviews.author: jason mabe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best Creatine on the market! Desolves great and mixes with drinks well.. took for 6 months on and now 2 months off.. getting ready to start again. DRINK WATER! It makes your joints and muscles cranky.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through the whole container now and I have to say I enjoyed using this product. It dissolved well and worked as it should. Greatly improved recovery time for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kuznetsov

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Helps my body feel great the next day, so that I can push harder and keep going. No stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: ItzBabyRuth

customer_reviews.title: Their products don’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Excellent company! What else could you ask for. No complaints here. It’s unflavored and literally has no flavor so 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No taste at all, dissolves completely
customer_reviews.text: Only been taking this for a week now, mixing it in with my morning protein shakes and I can feel the bit of extra it allows me to push in a work out along with gaining some muscle mass. Healing faster in between sets. Just make sure to stay hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this more than the pills from other places and I don't get that chemical feeling afterwards. Also no digestion issues. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Price!
customer_reviews.text: RSP is a great product, based on price and performance! great reviews as well!
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: I use this with a long list of RSP products ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a long list of RSP products because they all seem to work. I find that drinking this after my workout helps me recover faster so I can go back to gym without feeling sore.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Pence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, felt a difference after my first work out!
customer_reviews.author: Nick DeVincentis

product_meta.title: RSP Creatine Monohydrate – Pure Micronized Creatine Powder Supplement for Increased Strength, Muscle Recovery, and Performance for Men & Women, Unflavored, 500 grams
product_meta.description:
Size:1.1 Pound (Pack of 1)

RSP Pure Micronized Creatine Powder is 100 percent pure creatine monohydrate, which is the most thoroughly researched form available.

This scientifically proven formula has been shown to increase muscle strength, power, endurance and cell volumization. Creatine monohydrate is one of the most effective and beneficial ingredients for increasing lean muscle growth. Additionally, it works to reduce recovery time.

Creatine Monohydrate has benefits for people of all ages. It supports cognitive function, and has been shown to help decrease mental decline, as well as prevent muscle loss.
feature_bullets: PURE 100% MICRONIZED CREATINE - Every serving of RSP Nutrition Creatine powder contains 5g of 100% pure Creatine Monohydrate which is one of the most thoroughly researched supplements in sports nutrition and has been shown to safely increase muscle strength, power, endurance, and cell volumization

STRENGTH, RECOVERY, & LEAN MUSCLE GAIN - Pure Creatine Monohydrate has been shown to increase strength and lean muscle gains with minimal water retention, making it one of the most popular pre workout and post workout muscle recovery supplements for active men and women

MICRONIZED CREATINE FOR ALL AGES - RSP Nutrition Creatine is pharmaceutical grade and optimized for optimal absorption. It has been shown to benefit people of all ages as it supports cognitive function, helps to decrease mental decline, and prevent muscle loss
EASY TO MIX AND STACK - RSP Nutrition Creatine is unflavored and easy to mix with your favorite pre workout, post workout, and amino recovery products to enhance results

SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN - RSP Creatine Monohydrate is one of the purest forms of Creatine you can buy. Research has consistently shown Creatine Monohydrate to be on the most beneficial ingredients available for those looking to increase lean muscle growth and promote optimal recovery

specifications.Manufacturer: The Regatta Group DBA Beauty Depot
